author: Idaho State Journal
title: Ground News - WREATHS OF REMEMBRANCE: Local veterans and volunteers honor the fallen during Wreaths Across America Day at Pocatello cemetery
text:
Summary by Idaho State Journal POCATELLO — Wreaths Across America Day recently took place at Mountain View Cemetery, honoring veterans and the nation's heroes who gave their lives in the defense of freedom. Share menu More
